New Records: Sean Manaea pitched into the seventh inning without allowing Arizona to score.
The Mets are 18-8 when Manaea starts this season, setting a team record.
Manaea's strikeout rate has increased to 32.7%, matching Chris Sale's rate.
Key Match Events: The Mets defeated the Diamondbacks with an 8-3 score in the series opener.
Pre-Game Insights: Manaea's adjustments, inspired by Chris Sale, included a new delivery and pitch selection, enhancing his performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Carlos Mendoza praised Manaea's performance and confidence, reflecting on the team's success.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played under 107-degree temperatures, affecting conditions.
